name: WP Controller
author: hosting.io, campaigns.io

sections.description:
WordPress Controller application for users with more than one site – giving multiple installation management and stats overview.

Ours is different to the majority out there, in that we are focused on providing the overall domain view in terms of statistics, we have already integrated:
Google Analytics, Google Webmaster tools, Uptime Monitoring, SERP reports, Performance Reports, Domain Backup to repository (COPY.COM & FTP)

To create an account for yourself, visit
https://my.campaigns.io

and register a new account, please use promocode WP39164 which will entitle you to 10 free sites with all features, or 50% discount on any plan greater than 10 domains

sections.installation:
install via the plugins system in WordPress or manually
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
then:
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
Visit https://my.campaigns.io and either signin or register for a free account, login and visit the dashboard and “add a new site” using the url and admin user for the respective domain
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

Is this secure:
Yes, we use SSL layers on every aspect on our dashboard system, and the plugin creates a new hashcode to talk to the dashboard on each activation. Your admin password is never exposed or shared with any of our systems.
